Reference

Find Features

~ Functions for finding Spatial Data

findCDL()

Find Cropland Land Cover Data from the Cropand Data Layer

findGAGESII()

Find GAGESII points and basins

findNED()

Find National Elevation Data (NED)

findNHD()

Find National Hydrography River Networks

findNID()

Find Dams in the US Army Core National Inventory (NID)

findNLCD()

Find National Land Cover Products (NLCD)

findNLDI()

Get NLDI Data

findRoads()

Find US Census Bureau TIGER Road Networks

findSSURGO()

Find SSURGO Maps and Mapunit Aggregated Attributes

findWaterbodies()

Find National Hydrography Dataset Waterbodies

findWaterPoly()

Find Water Polygon

findWBD()

Find Watershed Boundary Geometries (WBD/HUC)

Find Stations

~ Functions for station locations

findAirports()

Find Airport Data

findACIS()

Find Meterologic Stations from the Applied Climate Information System

findASOS()

Find stations from the Automated Surface Observing System

findGHCN()

Find NOAA Maintained GHCN Stations

findUSCRN()

Find Meterologic Stations from the U.S. Climate Reference Network

findNOAAnorms()

Find stations from NOAAs 1981–2010 US Climate Normals

findNWIS()

Find USGS NWIS Stream Gages

findSnotel()

Find USDA NRCS Snotel Stations

Find Nearest Features

~ Functions for finding the ‘n’ nearest features to a location

findNearestAirports()

Find the Airports nearest a point

findNearestCOMID()

Find Neareast COMIDs

findNearestGHCN()

Find Neareast GHCN stations

findNearestHUC12()

Find Neareast HUC12 boundaries

findNearestNWIS()

Find Neareast NWIS stations

findNearestWaterbodies()

Find Neareast NHD Waterbodies

Tools

~ Tools for exploring, describing and defining AOIs

explore()

Explore Spatial HydroData Objects

meta.data()

Return HydroData Object metadata

saveHD()

Save File

to_sf()

Convert Spatial HydroData Objects to Simple Features
